fav-button-desc.message: Add or remove this background from your favorites

brightness-desc.message: Adjust the brightness of the background

no-source-title.description: Title of no source selected message

no-source-content.message: A default background was loaded. Please select a source in the left hand menu, and then refresh the page.

too-many-removed-title.description: Title of Too many backgrounds removed message

too-many-removed-content.message: A default background was loaded. You have removed all backgrounds in the sources you selected, you can reset your removed backgrounds or select more background sources.

too-many-removed-reset.description: Reset button of Too many backgrounds removed message

remove-bg-content.message: This will remove the background. You can't undo this action unless you reset the extension with the reset button in the menu.

remove-bg-confirm.description: Confirm button of remove background message

no-fav-content.message: You don't have any favorite backgrounds. To add backgrounds to favorites, scroll down the menu and click the heart when you see a background you like.

reset-title.message: Are you sure you want to reset your data?

reset-content.message: Choose what data you would like to reset:
